Title: Secrets of the Stars (1)
Plot: A fraudulent astrologer named Martin Trueman is hit by an extraterrestrial body and begins to impress everyone with his uncanny predictions. However, what he predicts for Sarah Jane is far from pleasant...
GuestStars: Russ Abbot, Mina Anwar, Ace Bhatti, Carryl Thomas, Nicky Ladanowski, Ed Hughes
